.. _op_env_setup:

OP enviroment setup
=========================
Before run OP, please doing bellow check 

.. Note::

 - OP use “module load” to load EDA tool version
 - please remove or comment out EDA tool path in $path defined in your .tcshrc or .mytcshrc or .cshrc
   ex. set path = (/tools_libs/apps/synopsys/icc2_vL-2016.03-SP5-1/bin $path)
 
 - Save modified .tcshrc or .mytcshrc or .cshrc
 - source /proj/onepiece4/op_env.csh
 - Open a new Terminal
